--- select_singer_with_table_alias_with_hint.sql
SELECT
  *
FROM
  Singers@{FORCE_INDEX=SingersByFirstLastName} AS S

--- AST
&parser.QueryStatement{
  Hint:  (*parser.Hint)(nil),
  Query: &parser.Select{
    pos:      0,
    Distinct: false,
    AsStruct: false,
    Results:  []parser.SelectItem{
      &parser.Star{
        pos: 9,
      },
    },
    From: &parser.From{
      pos:   11,
      Items: []*parser.FromItem{
        &parser.FromItem{
          Source: &parser.TableName{
            Table: &parser.Ident{
              pos:  18,
              end:  25,
              Name: "Singers",
            },
            Hint: &parser.Hint{
              pos:     25,
              end:     62,
              Records: []*parser.HintRecord{
                &parser.HintRecord{
                  Key: &parser.Ident{
                    pos:  27,
                    end:  38,
                    Name: "FORCE_INDEX",
                  },
                  Value: &parser.Ident{
                    pos:  39,
                    end:  61,
                    Name: "SingersByFirstLastName",
                  },
                },
              },
            },
            As: &parser.AsAlias{
              pos:   63,
              Alias: &parser.Ident{
                pos:  66,
                end:  67,
                Name: "S",
              },
            },
          },
          TableSample: (*parser.TableSample)(nil),
        },
      },
    },
    Where:   (*parser.Where)(nil),
    GroupBy: (*parser.GroupBy)(nil),
    Having:  (*parser.Having)(nil),
    OrderBy: (*parser.OrderBy)(nil),
    Limit:   (*parser.Limit)(nil),
  },
}

--- SQL
SELECT * FROM Singers @{FORCE_INDEX=SingersByFirstLastName} AS S
